actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage and to index it to 50 percent of the average hourly wage in the private sector.

summary.text: Minimum Wage Equity Act of 1987 - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for specified annual increases in the minimum wage. Provides, after such increases reach a certain level, for annual indexing of the minimum wage to 50 percent of the average hourly rate in the private sector.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the minimum wage and to index it to 50 percent of the average hourly wage in the private sector.
